Title: Daddy's Little Monster
Writer: Cole Sanchez, Rebecca Sugar, Patrick McHale (story), Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Pendleton Ward (creator)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Olivia Olson, Martin Olson
Plot: Continuing their mysterious quest in the Nightosphere, Finn and Jake must rescue their friend Marceline the Vampire Queen.
